C

CalendarDAO - Class in org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.dao
Singleton DAO class to manage the data in the user's session (the user session is used as the storage system just for test, it should be changed by either RDBMS or NOSQL database ...)
CalendarDAO() - Constructor for class org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.dao.CalendarDAO
 
CalendarService - Class in org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.services
Singleton Service class which interacts directly with the DAO layer to manage the user's data.
CalendarService() - Constructor for class org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.services.CalendarService
 
CalendarUI - Class in org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.ui
Custom ZK Div Component to initialize the angular calendar from server side.
CalendarUI() - Constructor for class org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.ui.CalendarUI
 
CalendarVM - Class in org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.vm
ZK Calendar View Model which handles the events data changes between the angular calendar model and ZK view model.
CalendarVM() - Constructor for class org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.vm.CalendarVM
 
ChartVM - Class in org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.vm
ZK Chart View Model which handles the data of the charts based on the user's events managed by the first component "Angular Bootstrap Calendar"
ChartVM() - Constructor for class org.zkoss.handlers.odaper.zangular.vm.ChartVM
